content:
Does Google index the zulip archive properly?

For example, I can't seem to find specific threads. If I search the term "site:https://isabelle.systems/zulip-archive Locale assumptions", I get no results. I would expect to find this thread.

No, I think that's because we are still running an older version (on my private server) which might not have indexed them by default. The new version allows one to specify which streams to index and also works with github actions.
In other words, someone should update the archive :')

Kevin Kappelmann said:

No, I think that's because we are still running an older version (on my private server) which might not have indexed them by default. The new version allows one to specify which streams to index and also works with github actions.
In other words, someone should update the archive :')

Done. Let's see if this helps.
